component.name: ButtonGroupHoriz
component.script:
sub init() m.top.layoutDirection = "horiz" end sub
function onKeyEvent(key as string, press as boolean) as boolean if not press then return false if key = "right" i = m.top.buttonFocused m.top.focusButton = i + 1 return true else if key = "left" i = m.top.buttonFocused m.top.focusButton = i - 1 return true else if key = "up" or key = "down" m.top.escape = true return true end if
return false end function
